# SHA-256 checksums for Phase 1 reference data
# Generated by: data/download.sh verify
# Format: sha256sum standard output — <hash>  <path>
#
# TEMPLATE — hashes are populated after download completes.
# Lines prefixed with # are comments and are ignored by verify step.
#
# To regenerate after download:
#   cd data && find raw/ -type f -name "*.tif" -o -name "*.zip" | sort | xargs sha256sum > checksums.txt
#
# ─── MERIT-DEM tiles ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Alpine (Himalayas)
PENDING  raw/merit/n25e080_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n25e085_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n30e080_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n30e085_dem.tif
# FluvialHumid (Congo Basin margins)
PENDING  raw/merit/s00e015_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/s00e020_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/s05e015_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/s05e020_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/s05e025_dem.tif
# Cratonic (Ahaggar Massif)
PENDING  raw/merit/n20e005_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n20e010_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n25e005_dem.tif
# FluvialArid (Colorado Plateau)
PENDING  raw/merit/n35w115_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n35w110_dem.tif
# Coastal (US Atlantic coastal plain)
PENDING  raw/merit/n35w080_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n30w080_dem.tif
PENDING  raw/merit/n35w085_dem.tif
